page.title: API Keys Management
page.subtitle: Manage and monitor your API keys
empty.create_first: Click the button above to create your first API Key
empty.deleted_here: Deleted API Keys will appear here
table.name: Name
edit.title: Edit API Key
edit.name.label: Name
edit.name.help: Used to identify the purpose of this API Key
edit.owner.label: Owner
edit.owner.help: Assign this API Key to a specific user or administrator. Admin assignments are not subject to user API Key quantity limits
edit.tags.label: Tags
edit.tags.help: Used to tag different teams or purposes, facilitates management and filtering
edit.rate_limit.title: Rate Limit Settings (Optional)
edit.rate_limit.window.label: Time Window (minutes)
edit.rate_limit.requests.label: Request Limit
edit.rate_limit.cost.label: Cost Limit (USD)
edit.rate_limit.examples.title: ðŸ’¡ Usage Examples
edit.rate_limit.example1: Example 1: Window=60, Requests=1000 â†’ Maximum 1000 requests every 60 minutes
edit.rate_limit.example2: Example 2: Window=1, Cost=0.1 â†’ Maximum $0.1 cost per minute
edit.rate_limit.example3: Example 3: Window=30, Requests=50, Cost=5 â†’ 50 requests and no more than $5 every 30 minutes
edit.daily_cost_limit.label: Daily Cost Limit (USD)
edit.daily_cost_limit.help: Set the daily cost limit for this API Key. Requests will be rejected when the limit is exceeded. 0 or leave blank means no limit
edit.total_cost_limit.label: Total Cost Limit (USD)
edit.total_cost_limit.help: Set the cumulative total cost limit for this API Key. All subsequent requests will be rejected once the limit is reached. 0 or leave blank means no limit
edit.weekly_opus_cost_limit.label: Weekly Opus Model Cost Limit (USD)
edit.weekly_opus_cost_limit.help: Set the weekly cost limit for the Opus model (Monday to Sunday), only for official Claude accounts. 0 or leave blank means no limit
edit.concurrency_limit.label: Concurrency Limit
edit.concurrency_limit.help: Set the maximum number of simultaneous requests this API Key can process
edit.is_active.label: Activate Account
edit.is_active.help: Unchecking will disable this API Key, pause all requests, and the client will receive a 401 error
edit.permissions.label: Service Permissions
edit.permissions.help: Controls which services this API Key can access
edit.dedicated_accounts.title: Dedicated Account Binding
edit.dedicated_accounts.help: Modifying the bound account will affect the request routing of this API Key
edit.model_restriction.list.label: Restricted Models List
edit.model_restriction.list.placeholder: Enter model name and press Enter to add
edit.model_restriction.list.help: Set the models that this API Key cannot access, for example: claude-opus-4-20250514
edit.model_restriction.all_added: All common models are already in the restriction list
edit.client_restriction.label: Allowed Clients
edit.client_restriction.help: Check the clients that can use this API Key
edit.confirm.cost_warning.title: Cost Limit Warning
edit.confirm.cost_warning.message:
You have set a time window but the cost limit is 0, which means there will be no cost limit.

Do you want to continue?
usage_modal.title: Usage Statistics Details
new_key_modal.title: API Key Created Successfully
new_key_modal.subtitle: Please save your API Key securely
new_key_modal.warning.title: Important Reminder
new_key_modal.warning.message: This is your only chance to see the complete API Key. After closing this window, the system will no longer display the complete API Key. Please copy and save it immediately.
new_key_modal.copy_help: Click the eye icon to toggle display mode, use the button below to copy the environment variable configuration
new_key_modal.close_warning.title: Close Reminder
new_key_modal.close_warning.message:
After closing, you will not be able to view the complete API Key again. Please make sure you have saved it properly.

Are you sure you want to close?
new_key_modal.direct_close.title: Are you sure you want to close?
new_key_modal.direct_close.message:
You haven't saved the API Key yet. After closing, you won't be able to view it again.

We strongly recommend saving it first.
expiry_modal.title: Modify Expiration Time
expiry_modal.subtitle: Set new expiration time for "{name}"
expiry_modal.activate_info: Click to activate this API Key immediately. It will expire {time} {unit} after activation
expiry_modal.datetime_help: Select a future date and time as the expiration time
expiry_modal.activate_confirm.title: Activate API Key
expiry_modal.activate_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to activate this API Key immediately? It will automatically expire after {time} {unit}.
create_modal.title: Create New API Key
create_modal.batch_info: When creating in batches, each Key name will automatically have a number suffix, for example: {name}_1, {name}_2 ...
create_modal.name_placeholder: Give your API Key a name
create_modal.name_placeholder_batch: Enter base name (number will be added automatically)
create_modal.description_placeholder: Describe the purpose of this API Key...
create_modal.expiry.title: Expiration Settings
create_modal.expiry.fixed_help: Fixed time mode: Key takes effect immediately after creation and expires at the set time (supports hours and days)
create_modal.expiry.activation_help: Activation mode: Key activates on first use and expires after the set time (supports hours and days, suitable for bulk sales)
create_modal.expiry.activation_info: Key will activate on first use and expire after {time} {unit}
create_modal.batch_count_error: Batch creation quantity must be between 2-500
batch_edit_modal.title: Batch Edit API Keys ({count})
batch_edit_modal.description_text: The following settings will be applied to the selected {count} API Keys. Only fields that are filled in or modified will be updated, blank fields will remain unchanged.
batch_edit_modal.tags.title: Tags (Batch Operation)
batch_result_modal.title: Batch Creation Successful
batch_result_modal.subtitle: Successfully created {count} API Keys
batch_result_modal.warning.title: Important Reminder
batch_result_modal.warning.message: This is your only chance to see all API Keys. After closing this window, the system will no longer display the complete API Keys. Please download and save them immediately.
batch_result_modal.preview.title: API Keys Preview
batch_result_modal.download_help: The downloaded file format is text file (.txt), each line contains one API Key. Please save the file in a secure location to avoid leakage.
batch_result_modal.close_warning.title: Close Reminder
batch_result_modal.close_warning.message:
After closing, you will not be able to view these API Keys again. Please make sure you have downloaded and saved them properly.

Are you sure you want to close?
batch_result_modal.direct_close.title: Are you sure you want to close?
batch_result_modal.direct_close.message:
You haven't downloaded the API Keys yet. After closing, you won't be able to view them again.

We strongly recommend downloading and saving them first.
renew_modal.title: Renew API Key
renew_modal.info.title: API Key Information
window_countdown.label: Window Limit
